# Auto-generated API Reference

The following APIs are implemented in OutSystems (OML/XIF) and their reference is generated using an internal tool:

* [BPT API](<bpt-api.md>)
* [EPA Taskbox API](<epa-taskbox-api.md>)
* [Charts API](<charts-api.md>)
* [DBCleaner API](<dbcleaner-api.md>)
* [PlatformRuntime API](<platformruntime-api.md>)
* [Users API](<users-api.md>)
* [LifeTime Services API](<lifetime-services-api.md>)
* [LifeTime SDK](<lifetime-sdk.md>)
* [BinaryData API](<binarydata-api.md>)
* [EnhancedWebReferences API](<enhancedwebreferences-api.md>)
* [HTTPRequestHandler API](<httprequesthandler-api.md>)
* [Asynchronous Logging API](<asynchronous-logging-api.md>)
* [IncludeJavascript API](<includejavascript-api.md>)
* [System Actions](<system-actions.md>)
* [PlatformPasswordUtils API](<platformpasswordutils-api.md>)
* [Sanitization API](<sanitization-api.md>)
* [Text API](<text-api.md>)
* [LifeTime Deployment API v1](<lifetime-deployment-api-v1.md>)
* [LifeTime Deployment API v2](<lifetime-deployment-api-v2.md>)
